titles.title: MP693 Thou art the everlasting Word,

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou art the everlasting Word,
the Father's only Son;
God, manifestly seen and heard,
and heaven's beloved one.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In thee, most perfectly expressed,
the Father's glories shine;
of the full deity possessed,
eternally divine:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
But the high mysteries of thy name
an angel's grasp transcend:
the Father only-glorious claim-
the Son can comprehend:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Yet, loving thee, on whom his love
ineffably doth rest,
thy glorious worshippers above,
as one with thee, are blest:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Worthy, O Lamb of God, art thou
that every knee to thee should bow.
